name: CoveredCallLongShortPairFinancialProductLibrary
description: Covered call Long Short Pair Financial Product Library.

functionDecorators.name: percentageLongCollateralAtExpiry
functionDecorators.description: Returns a number between 0 and 1e18 to indicate how much collateral each long and short token are entitled to per collateralPerPair.

parameterDecorators.name: expiryPrice
parameterDecorators.description: price from the optimistic oracle for the LSP price identifier.

returnDecorators.description: expiryPercentLong to indicate how much collateral should be sent between long and short tokens.

functionDecorators.name: setLongShortPairParameters
functionDecorators.description: Enables any address to set the strike price for an associated LSP. Note: a) Any address can set the initial strike price b) A strike price cannot be 0. c) A strike price can only be set once to prevent the deployer from changing the strike after the fact. d) For safety, a strike price should be set before depositing any synthetic tokens in a liquidity pool. e) longShortPair must expose an expirationTimestamp method to validate it is correctly deployed.

parameterDecorators.name: strikePrice
parameterDecorators.description: the strike price for the covered call for the associated LSP.
